C:\\Users\\abhig\\email-api-serverless\\.serviceRawFile:
service: send-email-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.9
  environment:
    EMAIL_USER: ${env:EMAIL_USER}
    EMAIL_PASS: ${env:EMAIL_PASS}

plugins:
  - serverless-offline

functions:
  sendEmail:
    handler: main.send_email
    events:
      - http:
          path: send-email
          method: post
          cors: true
